textBox.richText: For the second year in a row, we avoided the crowds at WP and spent the weekend up in the Goldminer’s Daughter up in Alta. This year, the snow wasn’t as good, but still got 3 days of good skiing in. They had more of the Greeley area open...Gunter, Max and I explored over there. Alta is much more about steeps, and not so much about bumps....I’m glad that I had that lesson with Tom that showed me how to get over my edges! One highlight: I saw Chuck Mumford (from GNAR), and gave him the pro call-out! Vid below...
